text: Rolf Adam Engelbrekt Alsing (12 October 1968 – 15 April 2020) was a Swedish television and radio host. He is best known as the host of the Swedish version of Big Brother (2000–2005; 2014–2015). He also presented his own talk show, Adam Live, as well as the Swedish version of Jeopardy!. He was born in Karlstad. On 15 April 2020, Alsing died of COVID-19 in Stockholm. He was 51. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1968 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Stockholm Category:Swedish radio personalities Category:Swedish television presenters
title: Adam Alsing
